name: Ready To Fly
description:
Purr Usual and Hegel's Bagels are excited to present:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

READY TO FLY - a music video game.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Are you ready to fly? To hit the sky? 

Take control of the song as you blast your way through the lyrical universe of this Purr Usual track. Blast lyrics, enemies and sneaky easter eggs to get a surprise at the end of the game!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys / WASD --- Move Ship

Spacebar --- Shoot

"X" or "M" key --- Roll Ship

"P" Key --- Restart level

Don't forget to SCREENSHOT and SHARE your high score, there may be a prize in store for you!

Tag @purr.usual and/or @hegels.bagels on Instagram to catch our eye and be in the running!

Be sure to try and shoot all 6 Easter Eggs, you will be rewarded...

Game developed by Tim Palstra and James Gledhill for Hegel's Bagels, 2021.
